content:
## Made with love by Plum
Are you beginning your startup journey in this city? Weâve got something for you.
At Plum, weâre always talking to Founders like you who want to build the best teams and products. Thatâs why they take the giant leap of moving to a new city â one that matches their aspirations.
But, navigating a new cityâs ecosystem while running a business and maintaining a social life can be tricky. In this guide, weâve compiled everything you should know about Bengaluruâs tech, startup, and life beyond the work scene.
â
ð£ If you have any recommendations, resources, or information youâd like to contribute, pleasefill this form(it wonât take more than 2 minutes), and weâll be happy to add.â

## TL;DR? We got you covered.
But our definition of care doesn't stop there. We built this guide to welcome you to a city we call home. Share this with your team and link this guide to your relocation policy. It will help plenty others navigating the city just like you are!
If you'd like to learn more about Plum and what we're up to,visit our website.
P.S. If you already find this useful,give us a shoutout on Twitter.
â
A quick Google search will pull up the following stats:

Walk into any cafe, and youâll likely meet people working on side projects or honing their craft. That kind of energy is infectious.
Overall, Bengaluru is a great city to live in. You have plenty of third spaces â nature, parks, museums, bookstores, and more â that will help you unwind and find your tribe. Weâve listed some below to give you a headstart in navigating your life here.
This guide would be incomplete without addressing the cityâs challenges. Bengaluruâs traffic problem is real. Those traffic memes donât show the real picture of how immobile the city could get. Choosing an office location can be challenging. The cost of living is high.
But all said and done, this is great city to live in. If youâre planning a move to Bengaluru or youâre already here, we hope this guide helps.

We also provide exclusive business insurance plans to help startups mitigate risk, enabling founders to go forth with courageous and ambitious bets.
